idea-plugin.name: IndirectFlowPlugin
idea-plugin.description:
Indirect data/call flow analyzer plugin for IntelliJ IDEA

https://github.com/valb3r/ClassAnalyzer

With this plugin, you can
+ analyze class relationships based on their indirect calls
+ generate indirect data flow diagram
+ function call diagram (similar to sequence diagram)
